name: item-incineration
title: Item Incineration
author: ForTheOnesThere
description:
Too much stuff? Not enough pollution? Incinerate!

This mod adds a variant of the electric smelter that you can use to burn (almost) anything to ash. You can then compact each stack of ash to a tile of landfill using an assembling machine. But be careful - burning all that stuff emits lots of pollution.

Features configurable settings in case you just want to quickly burn things into thin air, as quickly as your inserters will let you.

9/10 Biters would recommend this mod to a friend.
